description:
Offering the perfect position in a quiet street, this inviting family home is nestled amongst leafy reserves and green corridors. Fresh and bright and sized brilliantly for family desires, there is easy access to amenities including bus, gym and dining!

Features Include:
- Spacious single-level with easy-maintenance and family sizing
- Open-plan, air-conditioned living and dining plus large separate family/media room
- Superb kitchen in timeless white with excellent storage, stainless appliances and centre island
- Huge covered rear patio with good privacy plus tiled and covered front patio
- Lush flat yard with easy-care gardens
- Four built-in bedrooms with ceiling fans and/or air-conditioning
- Master including alfresco access, walk-in robe and private ensuite
- Separate study/additional living/fifth bedroom
- Family-appointed bathroom with superb vanity storage
- Separate laundry with cabinetry
- Double remote garage with storage
- Walk to shops, bus, gym and food outlets

Broadly appealing with a neutral interior and generous sizing, an elevated, private frontage opens to a welcoming interior with multiple zones on offer. Open-plan, air-conditioned living and dining enjoys tremendous natural light and sliding door access to covered front patio; stylishly tiled and overlooking the lush yard and hedged gardens. Perfect for those seeking flexibility, there is also a large family room, cosily carpeted and offering separation when desired with large stacker doors flowing to a huge patio; covered for all weather use and offering wonderful privacy.

Crisp white joinery brings timeless appeal along with excellent storage to the central kitchen. Laid out in a flowing footprint perfect for busy family use, there is a tiled splash back and stainless appliances with the centre island including seating.

Four bedrooms are on offer with each carpeted and including ceiling fans and/or air-conditioning. The master has direct alfresco access as well as a walk-in robe and well-presented ensuite whilst the family bathroom has a separate bath and tremendous vanity storage. Those seeking an area to work from home will love the separate study with the sizing perfect for utilising as a fifth bedroom or additional living as preferred.

Additional features include a separate laundry with cabinetry and double remote garage with storage.

A quiet street yet brilliantly convenient, you can walk to numerous amenities including a gym, coffee shop, food outlets and major bus routes. Prince of Peace Lutheran College is just up the road whilst you're also in catchment to the desired McDowall State School and Albany Creek State High!

Location Snapshot:
- 210m local shops/dining/gym
- 750m Prince of Peace Lutheran College
- 900m McDowall State School

Location Information
Highly sought after by families because of its brilliant proximity to numerous schools including Prince of Peace, McDowall State School and Northside Christian College, Everton Hills is also situated on major bus routes providing easy access to the Brisbane CBD and surrounds. In addition there are ample businesses who call Everton Hills home including numerous local shopping precincts as well as quick access to Brookside Shopping Centre, Arana Plaza or Westfield Chermside.
